title: A sneak peek of pharma’s Super Bowl ads: GLP-1s, tight ends, and more
description: What drug ads will air during Sunday's Super Bowl? STATus Report host Alex Hogan and reporter at large Damian Garde have a rundown of what to expect.
content: What drug ads will air during Sunday's Super Bowl? STATus Report host Alex Hogan and reporter at large Damian Garde have a rundown of what to expect.
